body.p:
Perry Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
agst } Indictment
Geo. W. Hank, Dreury Godsey, James Patrick, James Richie, Crocket Richie, and James Walker

The Grand Jury of Perry County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Geo. W. Hank, Dreury Godsey, James Patrick James Richie, Crocket Richie and James Walker of the crime of Murder committed as follows to wit; the said aforesaid persons, did on the 12th day of October September 1865, in the county aforesaid with Malice aforethought, kill and Murder John & Joseph Eversole by shooting them with Guns & pistols. Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Witnesses Robert Godsey
Andrew Eversole
A Copy attest
